sn27.10:4.2: “Yo, bhikkhave, rūpasmiṃ chandarāgo, cittasseso upakkileso … pe …
sn27.10:4.4: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu cetaso upakkileso pahīno hoti, nekkhammaninnañcassa cittaṃ hoti.
sn27.10:4.5: Nekkhammaparibhāvitaṃ cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ khāyati, abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyesu dhammesū”ti.
